name: Multi-Family Housing Non-Profit Transfer Technical Assistance Grants
objective: Provides grants to qualified nonprofits (NP) and public housing authorities (PHA) which will in turn provide technical assistance to RHS MFH borrowers and applicants to facilitate the acquisition of Section 515 properties by NPs and PHAs.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: Six 515 Nonprofit Transfer Technical Assistance applicants were each awarded grant funds in the amount of $500,000.
